title: Lumen Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Buffet, Salad bar, Take-out, Catering, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Reopened and managed by Black Olive Cooks early 2016. Serves made-in-house wholesome food with some vegan choices. Serves breakfast, lunch, snacks and cakes. Daily specials. A peaceful atmosphere in Bloomsbury with a lovely courtyard garden. Free Wi-Fi.
